title: gAnAnjali sheivom
sahitya:
gAnAnjali sheivOm vArIr madhura gAnAmrtam pozhiya nAnA mozhigaLilum


anupallavi

  tEnAna isai kUTTi teviTTAda shuvaiyUTTip-pAvANar pADalgaLai bhaktiyuDan pADi


caraNam    pUvAram shUTTiDuvAr pUraNap-poruLukkup-pAvAram shUTTiDuvOm parandAmanukku
nAvArat-tudi sheivOm nAnilattu rasikarellAm vAyArap-pArATTa vAniluraivAnai
